Note
Pretty and stylish, this skirt from gini and jony will make your little princess the centre of attention. Paired with one of her favourite party tops and those cute little ballerina shoes, your little one is ready to steal the show.

Product Details
Fuchsia coloured with metal zipper and button fastening and loops for belt, two side pockets on either side, two patch pockets on rear and brand logo on the left side of the front

Material and Care
100% cotton
Wash like colours separately
Machine wash cold water
Use mild detergent
Do not bleach, dry clean or iron on decoration or print
Tumble dry, normal, low heat
Warm iron and dry in shade
